page.title: 06Quantock Ponies
page.content: We went to see some{Quantock {Ponies.}The four ponies were in a field, two mothers and two foals. We went in the field. One of the foals was quite ugly as he was just changing colour but the other one was a light brown colour. One of the ponies was a{Quantock {pony}the other one was a pure{Exmoor. None of the ponies are{shod or {stabled}in winter. When on the hills the ponies mostly feed themselves. They used to have four foals here but one died and one got killed. They do not have a spcial call when they round them up. They are always sold in September. Most of them are broken in when they are three to four years old. Quantock ponies all have a good build and are strong.
